Pre-Game Insights: Memphis Grizzlies and Washington Wizards are set to meet in a non-conference action on November 9, 2024.
Memphis Grizzlies had a 27-55 overall record with a 9-32 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
Washington Wizards finished the 2023-24 season with a 15-67 overall record and an 8-33 record on the road.
Memphis Grizzlies averaged 17.4 points off of turnovers, 13.4 second-chance points, and 33.0 bench points last season.
Washington Wizards averaged 113.7 points per game while allowing opponents to score 123.0 points per game last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Injuries for Memphis Grizzlies include John Konchar (day to day, quad), Desmond Bane (out, oblique), Luke Kennard (day to day, foot), Vince Williams Jr. (out, leg), Marcus Smart (out, ankle), GG Jackson II (out, foot), and Cam Spencer (out, ankle).
Injuries for Washington Wizards include Saddiq Bey (out, knee), Malcolm Brogdon (out, thumb), Kyle Kuzma (day to day, groin), and Marvin Bagley III (day to day, illness).
